dynamic_tooltip: Division between layers is fixed by mouse position
mixed_tooltip: Division between layers is dragged by mouse
lyr1Select_tooltip: Select layer on the first position
lyr2Select_tooltip: Select layer on the second position
lyr3Select_tooltip: Select layer on the third position
lyr4Select_tooltip: Select layer on the fourth position
advice_sameLayer: One layer in different places is not allowed
no_layers_plugin: The number of layers is insufficient to apply the effect
lyrcompare_obsolete: Message to developer: M.plugin.LyrCompare has been deprecated, please use M.plugin.Comparators instead
